languages.text: {n}Голова становится легкой и приятно пустой. Кажется, вы уже порядочно набрались. На плечо ложится тяжелая рука — голос Соломона звучит холодно и настойчиво.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, вам лучше остановиться. У нас еще есть дела".

{n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."
languages.original_text: {n}Голова становится легкой и приятно пустой. Кажется, вы уже порядочно набрались. На плечо ложится тяжелая рука — голос Соломона звучит холодно и настойчиво.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, вам лучше остановиться. У нас еще есть дела".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you're more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder. Solomorne's voice is cold and insistent.{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

{n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you're more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder. Solomorne's voice is cold and insistent.{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

{n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

{n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

{n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

{n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

languages.text: {n}你的头脑感觉无比轻松、无比惬意。看起来，你喝得已经不仅仅是稍微有点多了。一只沉重的手搭在了你的肩膀上，索罗蒙冰冷而坚定的声音传来。{/n}“到此为止吧，行商浪人，我们还有正事要忙呢。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的头脑感觉无比轻松、无比惬意。看起来，你喝得已经不仅仅是稍微有点多了。一只沉重的手搭在了你的肩膀上，索罗蒙冰冷而坚定的声音传来。{/n}“到此为止吧，行商浪人，我们还有正事要忙呢。”

languages.text: {n}頭がふわふわと軽くなり、心地よく空っぽな感覚に包まれる。ほろ酔いどころか、けっこう酔っているようだ。ずしりとした手があなたの肩に置かれ、ソロモーンの声が冷たく、そして強い口調で響いた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、もうやめたほうがいい。まだ片付けるべき用件が残っていますから」
languages.original_text: {n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

traits.locale_text: {n}頭がふわふわと軽くなり、心地よく空っぽな感覚に包まれる。ほろ酔いどころか、けっこう酔っているようだ。ずしりとした手があなたの肩に置かれ、ソロモーンの声が冷たく、そして強い口調で響いた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、もうやめたほうがいい。まだ片付けるべき用件が残っていますから」

languages.text: {n}Tu mente está ligeramente entumecida y relajada. Parece que has cogido un buen puntillo. Notas una mano que se posa con firmeza sobre tu hombro, y oyes la fría e insistente voz de Solomorne:{/n} «Debería parar, Comerciante Independiente. Aún nos quedan asuntos que resolver».
languages.original_text: {n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu mente está ligeramente entumecida y relajada. Parece que has cogido un buen puntillo. Notas una mano que se posa con firmeza sobre tu hombro, y oyes la fría e insistente voz de Solomorne:{/n} «Debería parar, Comerciante Independiente. Aún nos quedan asuntos que resolver».

languages.text: {n}Hafifleyen başını hoş bir boşluk hissi kaplıyor. Görünüşe göre beklenenden daha fazla çakırkeyifsin. Omzuna ağır bir el konuyor, sonrasında Üsteğmen'in soğuk ve ısrarcı sesi duyuluyor.{/n} "Durmalısınız Hür Tacir. Hâlâ ilgilenilecek meseleler var."
languages.original_text: {n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hafifleyen başını hoş bir boşluk hissi kaplıyor. Görünüşe göre beklenenden daha fazla çakırkeyifsin. Omzuna ağır bir el konuyor, sonrasında Üsteğmen'in soğuk ve ısrarcı sesi duyuluyor.{/n} "Durmalısınız Hür Tacir. Hâlâ ilgilenilecek meseleler var."

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} d'un léger vertige, et votre tête est agréablement vide de toute pensée. Il semble que vous soyez un peu plus qu'{mf|éméché|éméchée}. Une main pesante se pose sur votre épaule, tandis que Solomorne vous interpelle d'une voix ferme et insistante :{/n} « Vous feriez mieux de vous arrêter, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous avons encore à faire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} d'un léger vertige, et votre tête est agréablement vide de toute pensée. Il semble que vous soyez un peu plus qu'{mf|éméché|éméchée}. Une main pesante se pose sur votre épaule, tandis que Solomorne vous interpelle d'une voix ferme et insistante :{/n} « Vous feriez mieux de vous arrêter, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous avons encore à faire. »

languages.text: {n}Dein Kopf fühlt sich leicht und angenehm leer an. Du scheinst ein wenig beschwipst zu sein. Eine schwere Hand legt sich auf deine Schulter und Solomorne erklärt mit kalter Stimme:{/n} "Ihr solltet aufhören, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir müssen immer noch einiges regeln."
languages.original_text: {n}Your head feels light and pleasantly empty. It looks like you are more than a little tipsy. A heavy hand is laid on your shoulder, and Solomorne's voice comes in cold and insistent:{/n} "You ought to stop, Rogue Trader. We still have business to attend to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Kopf fühlt sich leicht und angenehm leer an. Du scheinst ein wenig beschwipst zu sein. Eine schwere Hand legt sich auf deine Schulter und Solomorne erklärt mit kalter Stimme:{/n} "Ihr solltet aufhören, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir müssen immer noch einiges regeln."
